name: The Pope - Greet the People
description:
Global Game Jam Submission - Theme: Waves

1 man team, Created over 2 and a half days

Another Day has come and you are required to greet your followers from the balcony of St. Peter's Basilica.

There are five crowds located in St. Peter's Square. Keep them faithful by waving at them. Smite any heathen that might appear due to unsatisfied crowds.

Smiting requires faith in your divine position. This is created by waving at a crowd without heathen in it.

If you lose 3 of the 5 crowds to heathen then you have failed. If you can attract 10 new worshippers then you have succeeded for the day.
